name: I made this RPG in like, a day. it sucks and I hate it.
name_original: I made this RPG in like, a day. it sucks and I hate it.
description:
"I made this RPG in like a day, it sucks and I hate it, but if enough people like it I'll make a full game and claim it's a work of genius" Is an RPG (Real name: "Untitled") part of a challenge with a friend to each make an RPG Maker game in a 12 hour period with default RPG Maker assets. 

Idea stolen from this
